name: Space Breach
description:
Nordic game jam 2016 project, fix the holes in the space station by killing the aliens and plugging them into the leaks!

Also theres a cowboy hat, an i think we can all agree thats great!

Current build available is a post Jam delivery build, and represents a slightly better product.

Made by a team of 5.

Christian Møllnitz - Programming

Ernest - Textures & Sound Design.

Ingvar Olsen - Programming.

Marcus - Programming.

Michele - 2D art.
